div.pre: 1998 Taranto, Calabria, 1912 (1053) Burial: c. 235 B.C. Contents: 126 AR. Pot hoard Taras: 124 st. (4 Per. VII; 120 Per. VIII) 1 dr. (Per. VIII) Thurium: 1 st. (reduced weight) Disposition: Vlasto 8 (Cat. 819, 839, 841, 892, 906, 908, 913, 1088). Cat. 854 (there ascribed to N. 1057 = no. 1984 above) and 855-7 (there ascribed to N. 1058 = no. 1929 above) should perhaps be attributed to this hd. or to no. 2000 below Vlasto, RN 191T2, p. 283
